Reviews.Title: by far the worst camera I have ever used
Reviews.Author: nm87144
Reviews.Content: It is pretty much impossible to get a decent picture. The images consistently come out blurry and in irregular colors. I have tried every setting option in an attempt to fix the problem but nothing works. It also drains brand new batteries in a matter of hours. DON'T BUY! My cheap-o cell phone takes better pictures than this and it has a megapixel of like 1 1/2...

Reviews.Title: Less than expected
Reviews.Author: Jetblast
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera as a gift. My girlfriend said that she was not happy with the pictures that it takes. I will be buying a different brand of camera for her soon.

Reviews.Title: low screen quality
Reviews.Author: 4_boys_momma
Reviews.Content: bought this for my teenager for Christmas. the screen quality is very low! pics have seemed to print out ok, but not high quality. ok camera for a first, not a bad price.

Reviews.Title: Cheap Cheap Cheapppppp
Reviews.Author: Miranda Foderingham
Reviews.Content: I gave my 2 year old daughter this as her personal camera. This is surely a toy and nothing else.

Reviews.Title: qualtiy issues
Reviews.Author: tammybeeler
Reviews.Content: I chose this rating because all the pictures are always blurry, although it is suppose to be "shake resistant" and the zoom does not get as close as I would like it too.

Reviews.Title: back the money to my account?
Reviews.Author: cruz melendez
Reviews.Content: good afternoon, friends made ​​a return of the camera, and the same was debited from my credit card when you make the money back into my account?

Reviews.Title: hi
Reviews.Author: tc
Reviews.Content: hi i got this item and its for my mum for mothers day and i hope she will love it
